TopicTitle: The Connection in all of my stories.

Articles.Content:
So, some of you peeps might already know this, but i have most of my stories take place in a seperate alternative universe called the Ameschland Universe. And there is a story behind this all. So if you want to know more about it, feel free to read. The other thing you peeps should note that it is completely fictional, and nothing is supposed to be realistic, its semi-fantasy.

Back-Back Story

Spoiler

The Ameschland Universe came to be all the way back in 2013 when i made a Minecraft world named Dutch City, i got inspired by a YouTube video of people building a city. It became on of my best Minecraft worlds ever made and i started building up from that. In the same year, i started to make another universe called the Iconel universe, wich was later merged into the Ameschland Universe. The Iconel Universe is bassicly more Sci-Fi and fantasy because of interplanetary travel and things.

Timeline

Spoiler

2017-2045, Pre-Ameschland period. Earth gets struck by a solar storm disaster that leads to a global crisis. Nations start to fall and other nations start to rise.

2045-2057, Early Ameschland. Ameschland has recently formed and is in the state of building a community.

2057-2061, First Civil War. Rebels fight against the newly elected president, but since this forum does not allow politics i wont get too deep on it.

2061-2077, Middle Ameschland. Spaceflight becomes the most important thing in Ameschland History. 

2077-2152, Late Ameschland. FTL technology has been invented and successfully tested, along with other technologies.  Ameschland has become a superpower. 

2152-2243, Early Iconel. Spacecraft has become commercially available along with the first thriving colonies on other planets and contact with Aliens.

2243-????, Middle Iconel, Super Massive Spacecraft have been built. And Proto-Planets are avaible to anyone.

????-????, Late Iconel, ???????????
